website_summaries.verdict: Big and powerful space heater for large spaces with a long lifespan.
pros: Can heat an indoor or outdoor area up to 1,700 square feet
Five gallon gas tank can heat a space for nine continuous hours
Built-in thermostat allows you to easily adjust the heat
goes right from the box to heating up an area in no time
cons: The heater will turn off automatically
To keep the heat up, you'll have to manually increase the temp

customer_reviews.title: Money well spent for this heater.
customer_reviews.text: Why did I wait so long ? Great heater, starts up immediately, no smoking and puts out heat like stated. The only surprise was the cost of k-1 kerosene which is $8.38 a gallon at Walmart and $10.38 a gallon at Home Depot but the heater burns very efficiently so it doesn’t guzzle fuel to waste it. I should have bought one with tires and carrier because it is heavy with 5 gallons of fuel.
customer_reviews.author: Martin gallegos

customer_reviews.title: I like the product have no complaints as of yet.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as pictured its not reql quite but just about as noisey as others in this type i use off road diesel in mine has adjustable temprature. Use for my little work shop i put diesel in put handle on plugged in flipped switch on and it smoked a lil before first kicked on but it reliably lights. Its heavy full but not bad at all empty.
customer_reviews.author: Coreybuzzard2014

customer_reviews.title: won't start just blowin' fuel
customer_reviews.text: out of the box won't work. Pretty simple process to prep for use. Plugged it in and turned it on. It generates air pressure. it blows fuel. It does not ignite. Fuel is dripping out the front. This is happening on a Sunday and I am given an 800 help line to call. Get into this century and have online help. I am very lucky that I was just firing this up to see how well it worked and not in a situation where I needed it to function. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Pepsidrivah

customer_reviews.title: First night impressions
customer_reviews.text: Opened 2 fairly large windows in my shop. Turned the unit on and walked out of the 56 degree building. Walked back in an hour or two later (wish I had noted the time). Almost 80 degrees in the shop. I was barefoot and even the concrete was warm. Kerosene smell was barely perceptible as I had loads of ventilation and probably lots of heat loss too. It makes some noise, but it's not deafening by any measure. I'll update my rating and this review in one week after testing with varying degrees of ventilation. I was expecting first time use smell so I opened it up as much as I dared to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great value
customer_reviews.text: I have a 24 X 48 uninsulated bare studs garage and it brought the temp up to a comfortable level during a 20 deg. cold spell. I didn't have a thermometer but would guess it kept the garage in the mid 40's which for me is comfortable to work in. I used diesel fuel and the use was in the 1 to 1.5 gallons per hour range. I recommend a ceiling fan to bring the trapped heat down from the ceiling. I haven't installed one yet but I'm sure it would circulate the trapped heat down to the floor level.
customer_reviews.author: BVBob

customer_reviews.title: Never Fails
customer_reviews.text: This is my second heater from Protemp. I bought my first one about 5 years ago and it is still going strong. The new one is used in our greenhouse and the old one is now in my shop. I've never had a problem with either one. I use diesel in both and all is well. I highly recommend this heater.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Very good heater for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1100 sq ft garage and this heater does a great job heating it. It barely smells from the kerosene. My old heater was 24 years old and I can tell the difference since this is so efficient. This came in 2 days and was packed very well so no damage.
customer_reviews.author: DCS

customer_reviews.title: The second one was great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this heater two weeks ago. From the start I had to blow compressed air into the back, just make the fan start. Then the motor would rev up to normal speed, for a while. The speed dropped off to barely rotating, then back to normal, over and over. I returned the heater to Amazon. Today I got the replacement. It works perfectly and reflects the rating I have given it.
customer_reviews.author: donald

customer_reviews.title: quick heating capacity
customer_reviews.text: used it 5 times since purchase...works good.. not sure yet about using excessive fuel. Overall am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Don Fields

customer_reviews.title: Disapointed with the, allowed, fuel choices
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for heating a large open shop on our farm. I was not pleased with the big sign on it that said "do not use farm diesel". We have a farm diesel for our tractors and I thought having, relatively inexpensive, farm fuel would be a great advantage, as such I have not used it yet, but I will soon.
customer_reviews.author: Devers

customer_reviews.title: Bought with amazon gift card
customer_reviews.text: Husband ordered this when he received a gift card for Christmas. He loves it!! Heats up in seconds yet is cool to the touch on top. Heated our garage to 80* with the garage door open and it was less than 30* outside Now he wants to order 2 more.... one for each shop and garage!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: How to train your dragon
customer_reviews.text: Which ever dragon shoot fire out of its mouth, his name should be pro-temp 80,000. A little diesel and a extension cord and you are wearing shorts and a tanktop in February.
customer_reviews.author: Marek Sokt

customer_reviews.title: THIS THING IS AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: i have a huge 2 story shop and this guy warms it up in about 20 min...in fact its hot upstairs. works way better than i anticipated
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I used these units in our marine operations and they are well made and perform as needed. I would buy again - hopefully I be as pleased after a year or two of use.
customer_reviews.author: tb399

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Bought used from Amazon. Perfect condition in original box for discounted price. Couldn't be happier. Well done Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: RBlack

customer_reviews.title: Easy start, cools down quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Only have used it once, but it fired right up and worked very well. Ran about 6 hrs. on 4 gallons of diesel. Certainly won't be the last start for this unit. Winter will be long.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very good investment
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase, heats up my work area as expected. This is a safe and very reliable heater
customer_reviews.author: Rod S.

customer_reviews.title: Says can’t use biodiesel, but that is all you can buy
customer_reviews.text: It is supposed to be for kerosene or diesel, but the directions on the machine say don’t use biodiesel. Ok then tell me where you can buy diesel that is not blended with 5 percent biodiesel? So far have been running pump diesel in it which by label has biodiesel derivatives, and it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: greg l keffer

customer_reviews.title: Product too loud (and dangerous), not good for shops
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this product because it's too loud, unsafe, and could burn a place down. Be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Beau

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I use to heat my spraybooth for painting. Works excellent.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: it worked great last winter. haven't tried it yet this winter?
customer_reviews.author: Nick Goldsmith

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fill
customer_reviews.text: Heat my garage up in minutes! 23/23 size of garage
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Pro Temp kerosene heater
customer_reviews.text: Works great, super hot, thermostat controls the heat, a great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: William Lettich

customer_reviews.title: Heating the area that we needed to heat
customer_reviews.text: Does a great job on heating a 20x20 garage even during the winter months
customer_reviews.author: Teri L.

customer_reviews.title: Price is right!!
customer_reviews.text: Live in Florida, got it to warm up the OUTSIDE work area those chilly mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Edward T.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad for Christmas. Works great in his garage with kerosene!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Coe

customer_reviews.title: Thermostat does not work well.
customer_reviews.text: I tried 2 of these units. The thermostats are a joke. Shop would cool down 12 degrees before unit would fire back up.
customer_reviews.author: archie S.

customer_reviews.title: It is by far the best Kerosene heater.  THANK YOU, AMAZON!
customer_reviews.text: I use it to heat my 5-car garage. It really does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This thing sounds like the afterburner on an F-4. Don’t stand on front of it. You will be engulfed in flames. Works well. Too well.
customer_reviews.author: OD Jeep guy

customer_reviews.title: Very economical compare to propane heaters
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit, easy to use and most important is economical. We use this on our job sites and it is phenomenal. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Andy  Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: I have no problems with it so far great unit. Buy it
customer_reviews.text: thermostate,very little smell of kero after it warms up.I have no problems with it so far great unit.Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: paul b.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent heater
customer_reviews.text: Fuel cap position is not in a good location,everything else on this heater is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Donna Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Easily warms a 3 car garage enough where I can ...
customer_reviews.text: Easily warms a 3 car garage enough where I can turn if off after a while and close the windows. Only drawback is the noise.
customer_reviews.author: E. Timothy Franzen

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Heats my small 1 car garage very quickly. Have used for 1 season so far with 0 problems
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Perry

customer_reviews.title: So far so good only had one time where it blew disel about ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good only had one time where it blew disel about 10 feet in front of it . Other then that it works great
customer_reviews.author: kevin h.

customer_reviews.title: Great heater
customer_reviews.text: Use it to heat my 2 door garage and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Drayton Polzin

customer_reviews.title: Great heater.  Impressive amount of heat.
customer_reviews.text: Great heater! Works fantastic right out of the box. Fuel it up, plug it in, turn it on. The only thing that was not well built are the plastic pieces that screw onto the side to hold your extension cord (extension cord not included). One of them popped off the first day. The screw didn't really hold it tight to the body of the heater so wiggled back and forth and got caught on something and popped right off. To me, this is a small issue. Could've happened to anyone. The heater itself throws out an impressive amount of heat I was very surprised with how little fumes it produced.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Baptist Church Todd Ernst

customer_reviews.title: Used for firefighter rehabilitation
customer_reviews.text: Our EMA office used 2 of these the night we received them to warm firefighters and fire victims on a house fire in 0 degree weather. They were a godsend! They were easy to assemble in minutes and both units operated for hours that night with no trouble. We purchased the 215,000 btu heaters and will be purchasing 2 more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: John Hoke

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS FINE!!!
customer_reviews.text: its used for heating a shop and does a awesome job!! SO GLAD I BOUGHT IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: lynda m.

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Throws off mad heat, just really loud is my only complaint
customer_reviews.author: Joe Chesnas

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This heater is a great value it’s features are very functional great customer support from seller
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: This is loud, but man does it pump out some heat and fast. Thermostats is awesome and super easy to use. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: patter39

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise does a nice job keeping the garage nice and tosty during those ...
customer_reviews.text: Temperature differentiation seems to be a bit finicky... Otherwise does a nice job keeping the garage nice and tosty during those cold winter days.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Deming

customer_reviews.title: warmth
customer_reviews.text: Like very much, keep it in garage, a little noisy at first, but it setellled down + it's a multi fuel, which is rather unique.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth P. Argenta

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Heater So Far Heats My 3 car Garage Perfectly on the Cold Days
customer_reviews.author: Donald F.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: I recieved my heater Friday, missing axle, and axle nuts. Not having any luck getting ahold of anyone for parts. I do not plan on using until completely put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Chase

product_meta.title: Pro-Temp 45,000 BTU Kerosene/Diesel Forced Air Torpedo Heater
product_meta.description: Size:45,000 BTUWe bet you can think of up to 1100 square feet of your space that could use some extra heat when weather turns chilly. Enter ProTemp’s 45, 000 BTU Kerosene/Diesel Forced Air Torpedo Heater. This versatile, multi-fuel heater will be reliable no matter where you use it, be it shop, garage, or barn. In fact, wherever you need efficient, dependable heat this heater can get the job done. Its time-tested design includes ProTemp’s rigorously tested cold-start system, and the built-in convenience and advanced safety features you expect from ProTemp products. Pros choose ProTemp. Air flow: 170cfm

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
